name: Be a Keep It Clean Fundraiser
description:
Buy 5 and we'll send you 10!

Use them to sell in your church, school, or fair. Kit will also come with educational fliers to spread the message.

Mail in the remaining funds you raise ($100), or unsold soap by May 1, 2011. 

Each bar will be invested to provide jobs and help 3 people get clean water. Help spread the word and keep clean water pumping in India!  

Donations are tax deductible.

categories.name: Donation - Keep it Clean Fundraising Kit

name: Keep It Clean Soap
description:
The Keep It Clean Campaign supports the hiring of 25 more well mechanics in India. These mechanics will received tools and training - enabling them to bring clean water to 700 people each month!

Every bar of soap will help turn drinking water back on for three people. The soap is organic, vegan and handmade by the fine people behind CleanGetawaySoap Co. in Denver, Co. Specially designed by our Tribe just for you. 

Each bar comes with a booklet about the water program and the next The Adventure Project magnet for your collection.

categories.name: Donation to Keep It Clean - Soap

name: Betsy's 25th Birthday
description:
I'm turning 25.  And I want to help....
Donate $25 and I will ship YOU a wonderful and organic bar of soap....
